zinc.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a blue-white metal that is used to make brass and to cover and protect objects made of iron. It is a chemical element: symbol Zn
zinc.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a white metal used in manufacturing and traded on COMMODITIES MARKETS
zinc.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: On the London Metal Exchange, zinc fell in afternoon trading to a fresh 10-month low.
